title: Unlock Contact Centre ROI with a Smarter Modernization Approach
summary: The article discusses the importance of a structured methodology in leveraging AI, automation, and Workforce Engagement Management (WEM) investments for financial outcomes in the contact center space. It emphasizes the need for modernization in contact centers to unlock ROI. The article was published on January 15, 2026.
hook: Unlock contact center ROI with smarter AI and automation strategies!

title: ElevenLabs and Deutsche Telekom Bet Big on AI Voice Agents for Customer Service
Five9 Expands Google Cloud Partnership for Unified Contact Center Solutions
summary: Five9 has expanded its partnership with Google Cloud to provide unified AI and contact center solutions. This collaboration aims to enable customer enterprises to access integrated AI and contact center capabilities for quicker resolutions and more effective engagement. The partnership is expected to enhance the customer experience significantly.
hook: Five9 and Google Cloud join forces to revolutionize contact center solutions!

title: Slackbot's agentic AI makeover gives users their copilot
summary: Salesforce has begun a phased rollout of a reimagined Slackbot, an agentic AI assistant for Slack users. The AI-powered assistant, which was previewed at Dreamforce, can analyze user data to answer plain-language queries. It is designed to save time and can be connected to Microsoft Copilot.
hook: Salesforce's reimagined Slackbot AI assistant begins phased rollout to users.
